title: India continues to rely heavily on coal to meet projected 260 GW peak demand in summer
description: The ministry, which has been reviewing the situation regularly, has directed all power generating companies, especially thermal plants, to delay their maintenance plans, while gas-based power plants have been told to be available for generating electricity.
